metadata.title: CVE-2023-6531 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux Kernel due to a race problemin the unix garbage collector's deletion of SKB races withunix_stream_read_generic() on the socket that the SKB is queued on.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6531` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.5.0-16.16
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 6.5.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.5.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 6.5.0-16.16
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-16.16').
linux-aws package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-laptop package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
